item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

8/1/2011's location will be:
John Davenport's - BAR 19

John Davenport's is an Upscale restaurant located near the Top of the Omni Hotel in downtown New Haven.  "At the Top of the Park" it has some great views of the city from the 19th floor, and offers creative regional cuisine, comfort food with a twist, as well as a fine Wine List and specialty Cocktails.  Bar 19 will be open to us, and a second dining room is being set aside for overflow!

It's been quite a while since we visited this location, so let's come out in full force!

Drink Specials:

The Manager Lucien has generously offered to extend their already great Happy Hour deal to 7:30 for our group.

$2.19 for Beer or Wine!  (Starts at 4:30 regularly.)

There may be an additional food special offered as the date nears.

Please RSVP for this event to give the proprietor an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please clearly state this in your comment.

Thanks to Doug for helping with contacts for this happy hour.

 

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For more information about the Restaurant: http://www.johndavenports.com/

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Host (AJ) or try to contact them via the information below. We're also often the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour: John Davenport's - Bar 19
